channel.title: Need an advice for my blog
channel.description:
Hello, I have recently created my blog dmarketer.com (Search for **dmarketer** on google I can't post links) I haven't spent a penny to get this blog up and running except Hosting & Genesis Framework.
I had customized theme myself and written some high-quality articles.
I need advice on: Blog Design, Content Improvement, Anything you want to share.
Thanks
